content: the longest journey begins with a single step start your crochet adventure here another example of simple doesn t have to mean boring vagabond is a lightweight addition that floats around your shoulders and looks good in just about any yarn the two-row repeat is easy to remember so it s great for taking along in your travels and is low-maintenance enough for working on while watching tv additionally this scarf requires only a single skein of yarn and blocks to quite a generous size video tutorial by fiberspider is available here 1 on youtube many thanks to fiberspider **update ** fiberspider has also created a mod for vagabond to make it more symmetrical the video is available here 2 for anyone who would like to give it a look **items made from my patterns are intended for personal use sale or world domination--as long as i get a parking space wherever i want once the world is yours ** 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=pwzxy-okmm8 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=aa0q8dhcpmi
